abstract: New York Mets and the New York Yankees will resume playing spring-training games against each other in March 2012; other MLB developments noted.
snippet: After a 16-year hiatus, the Mets and the Yankees will resume playing spring-training games against each other next March.
lead_paragraph: After a 16-year hiatus, the Mets and the Yankees will resume playing spring-training games against each other next March.
